name: TheBrickDesignChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open the brick design challenge”
”Alexa, ask the brick design challenge for a new challenge”
”Alexa, ask the brick design challenge to give me a new challenge”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the brick design challenge
des: This skill provides a random design challenge for anyone playing with Lego (TM) bricks or other construction toys. It can be used as a one-player challenge or as a competition to see who can build the best. Simply ask The Brick Design Challenge for a new challenge to get started.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
